BetSmarter.title: BetSmarter
BetSmarter.description: A web application for smarter betting strategies.
BetSmarter.longDescription: BetSmarter is a platform that helps users make informed betting decisions using advanced analytics and machine learning.

Game%20Library.title: Game Library
Game%20Library.description: A library of mobile games for iOS and Android, built with React Native.
Game%20Library.longDescription: Game Library is a collection of fun and engaging mobile games designed for players of all ages.

BudJournal.title: BudJournal
BudJournal.description: A journal application for tracking cannabis strains and effects, built with React and Firebase.
BudJournal.longDescription: BudJournal allows users to log their cannabis experiences, helping them find the perfect strain for their needs.

Chloe%20Goodman%20Hair.title: Chloe Goodman Hair
Chloe%20Goodman%20Hair.description: A personal website for a hair stylist, showcasing her portfolio and services.
Chloe%20Goodman%20Hair.longDescription: Chloe Goodman Hair is a beautifully designed website that highlights the stylist's work and offers easy booking options.
